features: ❤S925 Sterling Silver Necklace Jewelry for Women-The pendant, chain and the clasp are made of S925 sterling silver with rose gold plating. These meticulously chosen materials not only ensure a stunning aesthetic but also boast hypoallergenic properties and resistance to oxidation.

❤Women Necklaces Engraved with I Love you- The rose gold necklace features a distinctive double heart structure, symbolizing deep love and connection. At the heart pendant's center, a heart-shaped cubic zirconia adds an exquisite touch of elegance and sparkle. Meticulously designed, this love necklace serves as a meaningful gift ideal for expressing love on special occasions such as Valentine's Day, Christmas, Mother's Day, birthdays, or anniversaries.

❤Perfect Women Gift Ideas: This heart pendant necklace has an elegant and unique look, easy to match with a variety of clothes, perfect jewelry to expand a female's fashion wardrobe. It's a great jewelry gift for wife, girlfriend, mom, daughter, friend, sister, grandmother, yourself, etc.

❤Heart Necklace with 5A Cubic Zirconia- A gem-quality cubic stone is embellished in the middle of the pendant, with high precision and fine cutting, it reflects extraordinary brilliance. Additionally, wearing this birthstone jewelry necklace is believed to bring good luck, health, and protection.

❤ Valentines Day Gifts for Women - Ready to be gifted, our love pendant necklace arrives in an elegant gift box, adding an extra touch of charm. If you have any questions or concerns about our product, please feel free to contact us. Your happiness is our top priority.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Double Heart and Great Gift Item!
reviews.reviewText: When I saw how beautiful this necklace and pendant are- and how wonderfully packaged- I thought this item would make a great gift for a very good friend of mine who is like a sister to me. For a long time I wanted to give her something that said how much she meant to me and when I saw this pendant, I knew it was the one.While some people may get it as a gift with a particular person's birthstone in mind, green colored stones are a favorite of her's and mine- but not a month of birth that is important to us (meaning the stone won't commemorate a birth month). However, not all jewelry stones, I think, have to signify important dates and births- some you can just get because they will look good and because you would like to wear a stone of that color- or someone else would.What I liked best about this pendant and necklace was the double heart and how the words, "I love you," were very visible. Not all jewelry inscriptions can be seen and read this well. Also, how some of the heart has diamonds and then- plain sparkling gold (over sterling silver). There is a card included with the box and jewelry care instructions- that you can also fill out and give with this gift.A great item and perfect gift for a loved one in your life- also, if you like it yourself- it's gonna look wonderful around anyone's neck! Please check out my photos of this "gem of a find" and if you have any questions about it- feel free to reach out and ask me!Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully Designed Sterling Silver Heart Birthstone Pendant and Necklace
reviews.reviewText: I recently invested in the 925-heart pendant and necklace as a gift to my wife, and it has proven to be a stunning expression of my love. I like the sterling silver construction of the necklace for me it not only ensures durability but also adds a touch of timeless elegance. I feel what sets this necklace apart is the customizable birthstone feature. Being able to personalize the pendant with my wife's birthstone added a unique and sentimental touch. I love the overall design and detailing of the necklace are simply amazing. While the price was bit higher than expected. I feel that despite the slightly higher price, the emotional value and sheer beauty of the necklace make it a treasure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful October birthstone pendant
reviews.reviewText: The females in my famile are hugh fans of birthstone jewelry. My sweet cousin, who is like a sister to me, was born in October, the same month as my mother. So, when I spotted this twisted heart shape necklace on the Amazon site, available in the October birthstone, with the unique feature of having the words "I love you" engraved on the side of the heart, I decided to order the necklace. The twisted heart is a nice size at approximately 1" across measuring from the widest point from side to side. The heart pendant is just a bit shy of being 1" from the top of the heart to the bottom. The chain is fairly substantial and drops to approximately 10", but can be shortened to about 8.5". You can also switch out the chain to a more substantial one if you would like to do so. The month of October has two birthstones; opal and tourmaline. This pendant has the tourmaline birthstone. Per the description provided by the seller, the heart pendant is 925 sterling silver, which means it is 92.5% silver mixed with additional metal(s) designed to improve the strength and durability of the overall product. The pendant and chain are a rose gold color, making them quite attractive. The sizable pink tourmaline stone is set towards the bottom of the heart and really stands out against the rose gold color. This 5 star ensemble includes a jewelry box, a cleaning cloth, a gift card and instructions for the cleaning and care of the necklace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Very Nice
reviews.reviewText: The Lomantise Heart Birthstone Necklace for Women is crafted with attention to detail and meaningful design elements. Here's what makes it special:- **S925 Sterling Silver Jewelry:** The necklace is made of high-quality S925 sterling silver with rose gold plating, ensuring both aesthetic appeal and hypoallergenic properties. This makes it suitable for sensitive skin and resistant to oxidation, ensuring long-lasting beauty.- **Engraved with "I Love You":** The pendant features a double heart structure, symbolizing deep love and connection. A heart-shaped cubic zirconia at the center adds elegance and sparkle. This makes it a meaningful gift for special occasions like Valentine's Day, Christmas, Mother's Day, birthdays, or anniversaries.- **Perfect Gift Idea:** The elegant and unique design of the necklace makes it easy to match with various outfits, expanding the recipient's fashion wardrobe. It's an ideal jewelry gift for wives, girlfriends, moms, daughters, friends, sisters, grandmothers, or oneself.- **5A Cubic Zirconia:** The pendant is adorned with a gem-quality cubic zirconia, reflecting extraordinary brilliance. Wearing this birthstone jewelry necklace is believed to bring good luck, health, and protection.- **Valentine's Day Gift:** The necklace comes ready to be gifted, packaged in an elegant gift box, adding an extra touch of charm. Customer satisfaction is a top priority, so if there are any questions or concerns about the product, the manufacturer is ready to assist.Overall, I appreciate the necklace's beauty, quality craftsmanship, and value for money, making it a good choice for expressing love and affection to someone special. :)

reviews.reviewTitle: I like it especially for the price and It is pretty
reviews.reviewText: In the realm of gems, there's a supernatural thing about the immortal charm of silver, particularly with regards to the Lomantise Birthstone Heart Jewelry. Created completely from real S925 silver, this flawless piece is something beyond an embellishment — it's an image of getting through affection and a commitment that endures forever.Authentic S925 Silver Style:At Lomantise, legitimacy is the foundation. From the chain to the pendant and the catch, each component of this heart neckband is carefully created from S925 genuine silver. Have confidence, our certifiable S925 things endure thorough testing, pursuing them the ideal decision for those with even the most sensitive skin.The Ideal Gift for Each Event:Engraved with the strong words, "I love you for as long as I can remember," the Lomantise Birthstone Heart Neckband rises above the common. It's not simply gems; it's a sincere articulation of affection. Whether you're commending a unique second with your significant other, sweetheart, mother, grandma, girl, or closest companion, this endlessness birthstone jewelry is an immortal statement of fondness.Boundlessness Hearts, Unending Friendship:This jewelry brags a remarkable combination a heart and an endlessness image, representing never-ending affection and association. The point of convergence of the heart pendant highlights a shimmering cubic zirconia encompassed by a sensitive rose, imbuing the plan with a hint of sentiment. The genuine silver neckband is the ideal present for events like Christmas, birthday celebrations, Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, commemorations, and that's only the tip of the iceberg.5A Grade Cubic Zirconia Brightness:Adding an additional layer of complexity, the Lomantise Birthstone Neckband grandstands a 5A grade cubic zirconia — a gemstone prestigious for its excellent lucidity and prevalent splendor, outperforming even jewels. The gemstone is smoothly wrapped by a rose, making a flawless pendant. With 12 enchanting varieties relating to each birth month, you can pick the ideal one that reverberates with your adored one's extraordinary day.All things considered, the Lomantise Birthstone Heart Neckband is more than just a piece of jewelry it's a testament to love's ability to withstand. This beautifully rendered image of eternal friendship will elevate your gift-giving experience and create a lasting bond.

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks nicer in product listing photo especially lettering on the heart
reviews.reviewText: The necklace is very pretty. It was larger than expected. It comes in a nice box but inside it is wrapped in plastic which I found odd. If you are giving it as a gift, you might want to open it up and remove the plastic. It also comes with a little gift card, a cleaning cloth and care instructions (see my photo). Apart from the plastic, it is a nice presentation. Looking at it up close, I had some issues with the quality, mainly edges not as smooth as I’d like. The middle stone is very sparkly. It looks nicer in the product listing photos than it does in person. The lettering on the pendant in particular looks nicer in the product listing. It has a cleaner, crisper font than the one I received.Overall , it is a nice necklace and would make a nice gift.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Beautiful Way To Demonstrate Lasting Love
reviews.reviewText: The Birthstone Heart Necklace is a stunning piece of jewellery that is made entirely from 925 silver. The necklace is the perfect size, allowing for the pendant to be it's focal point. The necklace and the pendant with a 5A-grade cubic zirconia come in a luxurious velvet-lined jeweler box that presents them very well.This genuine silver necklace is an excellent way to demonstrate one's love and commitment, which endure forever. The heart pendant with the etching "I Love You All My Life." features a beautiful sparkling cubic zirconia that is surrounded by a delicate rose encased in infinity, which is a wonderful way to symbolize eternal love and affection. It is a testament to one's ability to love someone forever, demonstrating their lasting bond. It is the ideal gift to present to a loved one at any time, to show that special someone how much they really mean to you.

This necklace comes in a nice gift box, and is presented well. The necklace itself is a simple and thinner chain with just the right length. The length can be adjusted a bit. The pendant though is a lovely piece. It has the birthstone to match the birth month. The pendant display beautifully when worn. However, the engraving “I love you all my life” which shows clearly on the product picture is actually very tiny. It is barely visible, and may require a magnifying glass to read it. Very satisfied with the design of the pendant, and the overall quality and value of the necklace.

This is a pretty necklace, it is made from 92.5% silver and a birthstone that matches the month. When I ordered it, the page asked me for the month instead of the stone which helped me from having to look up the proper stone.The Necklace comes in a jewelry box with the Lomantise name in large letters on the front and the necklace covered in plastic inside. If you are going to be gifting this to someone special make sure to open it up and remove the plastic so it seems a little classier. I liked the plastic being in place as a nice touch, but am thankful I opened it up before giving this to my significant other.Lomantise makes some nice jewelry that wont break the bank and looks good.
